user_query: My family is planning a vacation in France and we want to rent a villa for a week. Can you provide us with a list of available villas in different cities? We are looking for villas with at least 4 bedrooms and a maximum price of 5,000 euros per week. Please include the location, price, and any photos of the villas.

TaskList.description: Query available villas in France with at least 4 bedrooms and a maximum price of 5,000 euros per week.
Retrieve detailed information about the available villas including location, price, and photos.
